text: Marcelo Minhoto Ferraz de Sampaio is a handball player from Brazil. Marcelo competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. He was born on 24 February 1964.Xexa == References == Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian handball players Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from SÃ£o Paulo
title: Marcelo Minhoto Ferraz de Sampaio
